column2: "Nda no mu no nna ɔhen bi nnyi Israel: na nda no mu no ara so nna Danfo ebusuakuw no rohwehwɛ hɔn egyapadze aatsena do osiandɛ ɔdze bodu da no nna hɔn egyapadze nnyae nnkaa hɔn nsa wɔ Israel ebusuakuw mu."
"Na Danmba no somaa hɔn ebusua mu mbanyin beenum fi hɔn dodow nyinara mu
column3: mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam
column7: na wɔnhwehwɛ mu; na wɔsee hɔn dɛ
column8: Hom nkɔ nkɔhwehwɛ asaase no mu: na wɔbaa Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu wɔ Mika fie

column2: "Aber a wɔwɔ Mika fi nkyɛn no
column3: wɔtsee aberantsɛ Levinyi no ne ndze: na wɔmaan hɔ
column7: na ebɛnadze na ewɔ wɔ ha?"

column2: "Na obuaa dɛ
column3: Dɛm na dɛm na Mika nye me edzi

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Yɛserɛ wo
column5: ma yenhu kyerɛ dɛ hɛn kwan a yɛrokɔ yi bɛyɛ dwudwoodwo anaa?"

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ no asomdwee mu: EWURADZE enyim na hom kwan a hom nam mu no da."

column2: "Nna mbarimba beenum no sii mu
column3: na wɔbaa Lais
column4: na wohun nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu hɔ no
column5: mbrɛ woesi na wɔtsetse hɔ sɔnn
column7: komm na sɔnn; osiandɛ obiara nnyi asaase no do a ɔwɔ tum a ɔdze bogu hɔn enyim ase wɔ biribiara mu
column8: na wɔnye Zidonfo no ntamu twe
column9: na wɔnnye nyimpa biara nnyi hwee yɛ."

column2: "Na wɔbaa hɔn nuanom nkyɛn wɔ Zora na Estaol: na hɔn nuanom no see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom amandzɛɛ ɛ?"

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom nsoɛr
column4: na wɔmma yɛnkɔ hɔn do: na yeehu asaase no
column7: oye dodoodow: na hom ayɛ dzinn yi ɛ? Mma hom nnyɛ akwadwer dɛ wɔbɔkɔ na wɔakɔdɔ mu afa asaase no."

column2: "Sɛ hom kɔ a
column3: hom bɔto ɔman a wɔtse no sɔnn
column4: na asaase no so: na Nyankopɔn dze ahyɛ hom nsa; beebi mbrɛ asaase do adze biara nnyɛ na wɔ hɔ a."

column2: "Na Danfo ebusua no mu mbarimba ahaesia a wɔdze akodze emiamia tui wɔ hɔ
column3: fi Zora na Estaol."

column2: "Na wosii mu kɔree
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Kiriat-jearim a ɔwɔ Juda no n'ekyir. Ɔno ntsi wɔfrɛɛ hɔ Mahane-dan a ase nye Dan nseraban

column2: "Na wotwaa mu wɔ hɔ kɔr Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu
column3: na wɔbaa Mika fie."

column2: "Nna mbarimba beenum no a wɔkɔree kɛseraa Lais man no see hɔn nuanom no dɛ
column3: Ana hom nyim dɛ adan yi mu na asɔfontar na ebusua ehonyi a woesian
column4: na dza woegu wɔ? Dɛm ntsi afei hom ndwen dza hom bɛyɛ ho."

column2: "Na wɔmaan hɔ
column3: na wɔbaa Levinyi aberantsɛ no ne fie

column2: "Na mbarimba ahaesia no a woemia hɔn akodze a wofi Danmba no mu no wogyinaa abotsen no ano."
"Na mbarimba beenum no a wɔkɔree kɛseraa asaase no fowee
column3: na wɔbaa hɔ
column6: ebusua honyi na ohonyi a woegu no: nna ɔsɔfo no nye mbarimba ahaesia no a wɔdze akodze emia no gyina abotsen no ano."

column2: "Na aber a woyinom kɛhɛɛn Mika fie
column3: na wɔkɛfaa ohonyi a woesian
column5: ebusua honyi na ohonyi a woegu no

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Yɛ komm
column6: na kɛyɛ hɛn egya na ɔsɔfo: ana oye ma wo dɛ ibedzi ɔsɔfo ama nyimpa baako ne fie
column7: anaa dɛ ibedzi ɔsɔfo ama ebusuakuw na ebusua wɔ Israel mu?"

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no n'akoma tɔɔ ne yamu
column3: na ɔfaa asɔfontar na ehonyi no
column4: na ɔdze kɔr nkorɔfo no mu."

column2: "Nna wɔdanee na wosii mu kɔree
column3: na wɔdze mbofraba na ofiembowa na ahodze no dzii hɔn enyim."

column2: "Aber a wɔnye Mika fie ntamu twee kakra ara yie no
column3: mbarimba a wɔwɔ efiefi a ɔbɛn Mika fi no mu no boaa ano

column2: "Na wɔtseaa mu frɛɛ Danmba no. Na wɔdaan hɔn enyi
column3: na wɔsee Mika dɛ
column5: na edze dɛm asafo yi reba yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom afa m'enyame a meyɛe
column6: na ebɛnadze na mowɔ bio? Na odua dɛn na hom se me dɛ

column2: "Na Danmba no see no dɛ
column3: Mma wɔnntse wo ndze wɔ hɛn mu
column4: ɔno bɛyɛ na nkorɔfo a hɔn bo efuw ebotu ahyɛ hom do

column2: "Na Danmba no faa hɔn kwan kɔree: na Mika hun dɛ wɔyɛ dzen dodow ma no no
column3: ɔdaan noho na ɔsanee kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Na wɔfaa dza Mika yɛe no
column3: na ɔsɔfo a onyaa no no
column5: bɔtoo ɔman a wɔwɔ hɔ komm na wɔtse hɔ sɔnn no
column6: na wɔdze afona kunkum hɔn; na wɔdze gya hyeew kurow no."

column2: "Nna ɔgyefo bi nnyi hɔ
column3: osiandɛ ɔnye Zidon ntamu twe
column4: na afei wɔnnye nyimpa biara so nnyɛ; na ɔwɔ ɔbɔn a ɔda Bɛt-rehob mu. Na wɔkyekyeer kurow no

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ kurow no ne dzin Dan
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egya Dan a wɔwoo no maa Israel no ne dzin tse: naaso kurow no nkyɛ nkan no ne dzin dze Lais."

column2: "Na Danmba no dze ohonyi a woesian no sii hɔ maa hɔnho: na Jonatan
column3: Gersom ba no
column5: ɔno na ne mbabanyin na wodzii asɔfo maa Danfo ebusuakuw no araa ma okodur da a asaase no kɔr ndɔmmum mu."
column6: "#18.30 Hebriw no ka no dɛ: Manase ba."

column2: "Nna wɔdze Mika no honyi a woesian a ɔyɛe no sii hɔ maa hɔnho
column3: aber a Nyankopɔn ne fi no wɔ Siloh no nyinara."
